page.title: 08Houghton-Industry
page.content: Industry in Houghton is located on the Sedgeletch & Fence Houses estates in the west,& in Houghton the market place the west,the Sedgeletch estate covers 16.5 hectares with 5 factories. Adjacent is the Fence houses estate which covers about 16 hectares.9 factories have been built,6 are used for textiles,mechanical engineering, plastics & electrical engineering.The Market Place estate of 3.5 H gives 15 sites,which at present houses 10 firms .The borough council P.W.D.depot occupies 3 sites. Other sites are occupied by builder's merchants, garages & haulage firms. Apart from these sites there are offices,shops, schools & mineral workings.There are also two construction firms,a bakery & a instrument engineering company.
